item.title: CVE-2024-32436|2024-04-15T08:08:22.801Z -- Codemenschen -- Gift Vouchers
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Codemenschen Gift Vouchers.This issue affects Gift Vouchers: from n/a through 4.4.0.
